title: Kare wa Dandan Chi ni Somaru
original_name: 彼はだんだん血にそまる
sinopse:
1. Kare wa Dandan Chi ni Somaru
   Ryuichi was killed on the night after we became lover. What was left of him are the memory I had when we was still a friend and his self portrait.

2. Yo no Naka Kurutteru yo
   When a bullying is not forbidden again and become encouraged...

3. Jumon
   People often said that their life is boring, but I know a way to make it more interesting. You only need a certain spell to make it more interesting.

4. Requiem
   A group of girls confession about their dead friend.
